About Me

Hi! My name's Kate, owner of Kate's Mates, a local dog walking & pet sitting service in the Washington, Sunderland and wider Newcastle area.

  • I am DBS checked, have a Pet First aid qualification and years of experience walking a variety of dogs. I am also currently working towards a dog training qualification.
  • I'm a countryside girl at heart and love getting lost in the wilderness, exploring beaches and finding new places to enjoy with Alfie (my black lab!)
  • Check out all of my available services and contact me with any questions you might have!

My Services

I offer a wide array of services from dog walking, cat visits and pet visits. take a look below of what I have to offer!

Dog Walking

Group dog walk (maximum 4 dogs)â€‹ or Solo walkies.

An hour long walk for your pooch through woodlands, beaches and countryside trails. Your dog will receive lots of interaction with myself and other dogs on group walks. Lots of fun and games!

Get in touch

From: £12

Cat Visits

I'll pop in to visit your cat or kitten, clean out the litter trays, administer medication and play with them for up to an hour.

I can offer multiple visits throughout the day if you require, get in touch to discuss your requirements.

Get in touch

From: £12

Pet Visits

Just got a new puppy or elderly dog? I can pop in for single or multiple visits throughout the day.

I'll clean up any accidents, take them out for the toilet, play with them and feed them some treats!

Get in touch

From: £12
